infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses your photo library to let you choose photos to upload and enhance your profile and post posts with photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses your photo library to let you choose photos to upload and enhance your profile and post posts with photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use the location to display posts in your city and for a better experience with the map
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use the location to display posts in your city and for a better experience with the map
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryDiskSpace: Our application uses the disk space access API to optimize the storage of data required for operation.

NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypeReasons: 85F4.1 - Display disk space information to users, may send over local network with permission.
E174.1 - Check disk space for file operations, adjust app behavior based on space availability.
DDA9.1 - Display file timestamps to users, not sent off-device.
C617.1 - Access metadata of files within the app's container for internal use.
